channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Hey guys, me and a friend are trying to set up a server. But here is the problem, we've done evrything we could but we can't let friends connect to the server. they get the error connecting to server.
Yes we have port forwarded.
I will update in a second with what we have tried.(My mate is offline at the moment.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2009, 08:09:49 am[/size][hr]Oh god, wrong section. Please move mods.
